Text: Yes it is a Mac port. Some say the port runs better than the native.
Just to make this clear I am using the porting team's wrapper. I am giving all credit of the wrapper to the porting team. Just so no one has the urge to bitch.

It's fine with my MacBook Pro late 2007 
with 4 gigs ram and 2.2GHz CPU 128 Mb Video Card
Hey im having trouble i cant seem to run the game. im on osx 10.6.8 imac. is there anything special i should be doing?
What happens when you try to run it?
nothing.... literally i click open on the app but it just seems to bounce as if it is responding to something then suddenly stops alas nothing happens at all
Thats odd. What are your specs?
